name: Catapult Simulator
description:
We love physics-based games, but we wanted to add some strategic depth to them. So we decided on shooting everyday objects from a catapult. Obviously.


A bathtub itself may only kill the minion it directly hits, but it also spills water. While it doesn’t deal any direct damage, just add an electrical toaster…


… and you suddenly electrocute all the minions standing in it!

A car itself deals decent damage, but it’s also a great means of transportation for your other weapons - just put a magnet on it and you will disarm a lot of minions on its way! Or if you are feeling funky, you can put fireworks battery on a spinning record player for 360-degree fire coverage. Then put it on a car. The possibilities are limitless.


  • Combine objects to make powerful combos and create mayhem on the battlefield!
  • Deep, deckbuilding mechanics to make things more challenging.
  • Upgrade your castle to unlock powerful abilities.
  • Manipulate terrain to your advantage.
